input.sentences: [male] and his wife loved each other very much .
they had everything they could ever want in a marriage .
[male] was getting married to his sweetheart that day .
the tow made their vows and became a married couple .
the first dance as husband and wife ensued shortly after .
output.sentences: Margaret and Gavin arrive at Julia and Mike's wedding, finally.
They make such a cute couple not letting the rainy weather dampen their spirits.
The reception is already in full swing, with Julia and Mike looking so happy and in love.
Julia's dad does the toast, including the requisite embarrising comment.
Dont they look the lovely couple, in their first dance together as man and wife.
